en: I'm so proud of my PorchFest winners.
vi: Mẹ tự hào những người chiến thắng nhạc hội quá.

en: How about your Porchy winner?
vi: Vậy còn người, thắng cúp Porchy?

en: Oh, you better believe it.

en: Well, I couldn't have done it without Natasha.

en: And I couldn't have done it

en: without blackmailing Hunter and Vivian.

en: I'm really happy for you guys.

en: I'm also happy to be home starting a band.
About that, I got us our first gig.

en: Without asking me?
